text: Vinctifer is an extinct genus of prehistoric bony fish. It was erected by David Starr Jordan in 1919. It could exceed 60 cm. It is a member of the extinct order Aspidorhynchiformes. == Fossil record == Fossils of Vinctifer have been found in Brazil, Mexico, Venezuela, and Antarctica. == Description == Vinctifer possessed an elongated body and did not have a supramaxilla. The mandible was robust and triangular. == References == # Sepkoski, Jack (2002). "A compendium of fossil marine animal genera". Bulletins of American Paleontology. 363: 1â€“560. title: Vinctifer
